Project: Reelin Controls Cilia Directionality and Centriole Positioning in Laminated Cortical Regions
My doctoral research focuses on how the Reelin signaling pathway regulates neuronal polarity and ciliary orientation during cortical development. This work combines high-resolution confocal imaging, immunostaining, and quantitative analysis to explore how molecular cues shape neuronal migration and laminar organization in the mammalian brain.
